title: Graciously Requesting 9 RP
body:
I am currently 9 RP short of obtaining a skin and would, if possible, be granted the privilege of receiving 9 RP.

A poem can be written if it is required to receive the 9 RP.

Yours Sincerely, PhorPhex.

replies.body: If you send a support ticket detailing everything above then Riot is often kind enough to give you a portion of RP as long as it's reasonable.
Lol my god, I forgot about that.
